name: BEST WESTERN PLUS Landmark Inn & Pancake House

reviews.text: We stayed at the Best Western Landmark for over a week and LOVED it! The location was very convenient with easy access to restaurants, Wal-mart and the freeway (but not too close that you can hear it!).
reviews.title: THE BEST!!

likes.liked: — Hard to pick my favorite....the cookies?!!!!

reviews.title: Good access to Park City snow resorts
reviews.text: When we first walked in we loved all the places to hang out. We were there with a large group and there were tables and chairs all around the large lobby area. Behind that was an indoor pool and jacuzzi, along with a ping pong table and pool table. This area led outside to a BBQ area with more tables and chairs and a volleyball net.

reviews.title: Decent Stay at the Landmark Inn
reviews.text: This hotel is clean, the service was exceptionally friendly and they allowed us to bring our dog. It was the utmost of convenience and a pretty good bargain, too!

reviews.title: good value
reviews.text: Be sure to try the freshly baked cookies they put out every afternoon! We will definitely stay there again.
I spent a week at the Best Western in Kimball Junction. It is located near the interstate and 4 miles from Park City.
reviews.title: Great hotel!

reviews.text: It was a very pleasant stay, with every day free fresh baked cookies, newspaper and tea or coffee. Shopping area close by (Walmart, restaurants and oulet center). Free bus rides to mountain resort and main street, free hotel shuttle to mountain resort and canyons. Nice and clean rooms.
reviews.title: nice Hotel!
Good Prices for what you get
Terrible service.
reviews.text: They have to dump the awful JB restaurant (stinky place, bad breakfast/diner)

aka: Best Western Plus Landmark Inn & Pancake House Hotel
